original_text: And it came to pass, that in the fifth year of king Rehoboam Shishak king of Egypt came up against Jerusalem, because they had transgressed against the Lord,
korean_text: 그들이 여호와께 범죄하였으므로 르호보암 왕 제오년에 애굽 왕 시삭이 예루살렘을 치러 올라오니

sentences.original_text: that in the fifth year of king Rehoboam
Shishak king of Egypt came up against Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 이집트 왕 시삭이 예루살렘을 치러 올라왔으니

sentences.original_text: because they had transgressed against the Lord
